# Top / Right / Bottom / Left

For detailed information, please consult the Tailwind CSS documentation.

## Compatibility

| Class                | Support        |
| -------------------- | -------------- |
| `inset-{n}`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `inset-[n]`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `inset-x-{n}`        | âœ… Full Support |
| `inset-y-[n]`        | âœ… Full Support |
| `top-{n}`            | âœ… Full Support |
| `top-[n]`            | âœ… Full Support |
| `bottom-{n}`         | âœ… Full Support |
| `bottom-[n]`         | âœ… Full Support |
| `left-{n}`           | âœ… Full Support |
| `left-[n]`           | âœ… Full Support |
| `right-{n}`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `right-[n]`          | âœ… Full Support |
| `inset-auto`         | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `inset-x-auto`       | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `inset-y-auto`       | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `top-auto`           | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `bottom-auto`        | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `left-auto`          | ğŸŒ Web only    |
| `right-auto`         | ğŸŒ Web only    |
